TopicTitle: KSP RP forum server CPU usage exceeded.

Articles.Content:
> 
> Oh. Oh crap then.
> 
> Anyone else getting it? I\'d assume so... but I\'m usually wrong.

Everyone is getting it.

> 
> Everyone is getting it.

Oh yey! I wasn\'t wrong this time!
Maybe now is the time for donating? Have we past the limit?
I have a station ready for the RCK, once it gets back up.

It does actually seem so, on further inspection. Only (forumname)/index.php is getting the php error, just (forumname) gets a redirect to the host home page. The PHP is throwing up errors because it\'s for a page that doesn\'t exist.

> 
> I have a station ready for the RCK, once it gets back up.

Oh goody.
What seems so?
We passed the bandwidth limit.
Okay, maybe it\'s time to bust out the donations. Lemme see how much I have in my change battery upstairs...
Dang it
Alright, we are idiots.

You guys need to make sure you\'re not hosting your images and files on the forums. Don\'t do attachments. I can\'t imagine a small forum would eat up that much bandwidth if there were no attachments. That or the host being used is crap.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
'sigh' may my sig and whatever is left of the Spearkan Federation rest in peace
I think I have only seen nine posts with attachments. That is scary. And Spearka, we liberated your island, in the glory of socialism!
While socialism is good, imperialism isnt! When will You get that!

> 
> I think I have only seen nine posts with attachments. That is scary. And Spearka, we liberated your island, in the glory of socialism!

Do not bring in RP on these forums. Liberation is not in KSP itself, and can thus be seen as RP.

Do not break rule two.

Do not let me within 10 lightyears of explosives.

That is all.
Im not sure its even possible to post 100gb in 12 days, with less than 20 people (I think)
Not post, but use by viewing. When the forum comes back up, I\'m taking the F5 button off of my keyboard.

I don\'t see why the war of capitalism and socialism. Good thing I\'m not really RPing.

Good job guys.
Aha, the i might have to plee guilty

> 
> I don\'t see why the war of capitalism and socialism. Good thing I\'m not really RPing.

> Good job guys.

This post confuses me

IE, people who have socialism want to attack capitalism (forcefully), vice versa...

The point? I don\'t know.
No, *Imandreas* wants to kill all the socialists, and no-one else cares.

I just want a balance of socialists to capitalists. Ya know, no one taking over the world.
